articles.title: 14-year-old arrested after man kicked into moving train at Back Bay
articles.description:
Police have not publicly identified the teen, who will be charged with assault and battery with a dangerous weapon.

The post 14-year-old arrested after man kicked into moving train at Back Bay appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A 14-year-old was arrested for kicking a man into a moving train at Back Bay.
The teen faces charges of assault and battery with a dangerous weapon.
This incident raises concerns about safety at Boston's public transit stations.

articles.title: Jaylen Brown helps Celtics thump Steph Curry-less Warriors 121-110
articles.description:
Kristaps Porzingis made his Warriors debut against the Celtics, who traded him away for salary cap reasons in the offseason.

The post Jaylen Brown helps Celtics thump Steph Curry-less Warriors 121-110 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jaylen Brown led the team, contributing significantly to the win.
Kristaps Porzingis faced his former team, impacting local fan narratives.
